name: storemanager
description: API backend for store manager application.

scripts.start-dev: npm run migrations && npm run clean-dev && babel server -d server/build/dev && node server/build/dev/app
scripts.start: npm run clean-dev && babel server -d server/build/dev && node server/build/dev/app
scripts.test: npm run migrations && mocha server/test --compilers js:babel-core/register --exit || true
scripts.test-dev: npm run clean-dev && npm run clean && babel server -d server/build/dev && mocha --recursive server/build/dev --exit || true
scripts.build: npm run clean && babel server -d server/build && node server/build/app
scripts.coveralls: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.migrations: npm run unmigrate && npm run migrate && npm run seed

author: Ekunola Ezekiel
